mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.code, m.name, m.title, m.menu_type, m.path, m.component, m.permission, m.icon, m.sort, m.visible, m.status, m.is_deleted, m.remark, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND m.visible = 1 AND m.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY m.sort ASC
